category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Cfg0EnableFreeFormRuleSupport
preference.preference_description: Enables or disables authoring of new Free-form Rules and editing of Free-form Expression in the Product Configurator application. The Valid Values: -true: Enables creation of Free-form rule. -false:Disables creation of Free-form rule. This is the default value.
